timeline.message: Avoid ICC_ColorSpace instances in Apache Tika to support GraalVM 20.3

Move Tika substitutions to proper package

Also add a comment about removing the PDFBox one when migrating to
GraalVM 21.

timeline.bodyText: Do you really need to leave this commented out? I thought the @Disabled in ImageIOTestCase would be enough?
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: No, it won't. It will still be included in the native image and that's what causes the issue. The issue is at build time not runtime.
replies.author: gsmet

timeline.message:
Disable Image IO tests for now

We will bring them back when upgrading to GraalVM 21 but for now they
don't work with GraalVM 20.3.
